title: Charge your new Apple gear with $30 off this fantastic Belkin 3-in-1 charger
content:
Macworld

If one of your New Year resolutions is to finally keep a tidy desk, then this Belkin MagSafe charger is just what you need. Even better, this charger is down to $90 at Amazon, a $30 savings and the best price we’ve ever seen. (This price is for the black model but the white model is also on sale for $20 off)

This Belkin charging tree occupies very little space on your desk and eliminates having a gazillion wires strewn all over your workspace. The base is where you can neatly place your AirPods to charge, while the frame will magnetically hold your phone and watch. Finally, the weighted anti-slip base will ensure the stand stays in place even with the heaviest of iPhones.

This 3-in-1 station can simultaneously charge all three of your devices, with up to 15W power for your phone and 5W for your earbuds and Apple Watch. What’s cool is that you can even use this if you have a case on your phone (as you should). It comes with a 40W power adapter and a 5ft cable that is long enough for you to plug under your desk or nightstand.

So, don’t miss the chance to get this amazing Belkin charging station for $90 at Amazon right now and get your cables uncluttered for 2025.
